content:
ICS 160E/EECS 114 - Algorithms Midterm 1 Study Questions

Doing the assigned readings from Chapters 1-2 and solving the following questions will provide a good preparation for the first midterm exam, scheduled for Friday, April 27, 9:00am, in our usual classroom.

  1. Problem R-1.6 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  2. Problem R-1.12 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  3. Problem R-1.15 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  4. Problem R-1.19 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  5. Problem C-1.15 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  6. Problem C-1.29 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  7. Problem C-1.31 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  8. Problem R-2.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  9. Problem R-2.6 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  10. Problem R-2.8 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  11. Problem R-2.9 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  12. Problem R-2.10 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  13. Problem R-2.11 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  14. Problem R-2.12 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  15. Problem R-2.16 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  16. Problem C-2.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  17. Problem C-2.9 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  18. Problem C-2.10 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  19. Problem C-2.11 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  20. Problem C-2.15 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
